title: EP 123: Teach Them Their Worth w/April Richie
itunes:title: EP 123: Teach Them Their Worth w/April Richie
description:
In this episode, we take a slight detour from the streets and sit down with author & Compton native April Ritchie to discuss her latest book "Teach them their worth". We talk about the importance of fathers in their daughters lives and how a lot of issues such as low self esteem and even promiscuous behavior come from a lack of fatherly influence.

To order April's book hit this link

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
In this episode, we take a slight detour from the streets and sit down with author & Compton native April Ritchie to discuss her latest book "Teach them their worth". We talk about the importance of fathers in their daughters lives and how a lot of issues such as low self esteem and even promiscuous behavior come from a lack of fatherly influence.
